pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Label Formatting // The 'spork' syntax describes label formatting concisely, supporting mixed nesting of subscripts and superscripts to arbitrary depth. It intends to be easy to read and write in plain text, and easy to convert to equivalent presentations in 'plotmath' and 'latex'. Greek symbols and a multiplication symbol are explicitly supported. See ?as_spork and ?as_previews.
